titleInfo.title: Members of the Greeley Hebrew Progressive Club on a Picnic

physicalDescription.extent: 2 item (photograph), 5 x 8 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On back of photograph: ''#23 Picnic of Hebrew Progressive Club, Greeley, Colorado, Donor Mrs. Morris Judd''. On back of duplicate photograph: ''#23, The Hebrew Progressive Club of Greeley at annual picnic, 1921, donated by: Mrs. Eleanor Judd (nee Winogard).'' On envelope: ''#23 Hebrew Progressive Club of Greeley, Co, Annual Picnic, 1921''.

mods.abstract: Annual picnic of the Hebrew Progressive Club of Greeley, Colorado. Three men and five women pose in the woods in front of a cabin. Greeley had a modest but socially active Jewish population in the early 20th century.
mods.note: Appears in ''Images of America, Jewish Denver: 1859-1940'' by Dr. Jeanne Abrams on page 124.

name.namePart: Hebrew Progressive Club of Greeley (Greeley, Colo.)
